DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase III randomized study which compares two different regimens of chemotherapy. The purpose of the study is to determine which of the two regimens will make the tumor smaller or disappear, and for how long. In addition the disease-related symptoms will be evaluated. The safety of the drugs will be determined based upon evaluation of the side effects
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Study of Gemcitabine Plus a Cytotoxic Agent Versus Two Cytotoxic Agents
DOC.criteria: Locally advanced and/or metastatic breast cancer. Measurable disease Previously treated with anthracycline Patients with inflammatory breast disease
